results.title: Effect of amlodipine on myocardial functional and metabolic recovery following coronary occlusion and reperfusion in dogs.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on myocardial functional and metabolic recovery following @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@ and reperfusion in @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@.

results.title: Beneficial actions of amlodipine in the multiple-stunned canine myocardium.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Sodium_Chloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012965 @@@Saline@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (200 micrograms/kg, IV) were administered 15 minutes prior to the first @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@.

results.title: Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs.
results.text_hl: Subepicardial collateral blood flow was higher in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group during @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@.

results.title: Absence of hemodynamic deterioration in the presence of amlodipine following experimental myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: The area ejection fraction, assessed by echocardiography, was similar in both groups (43 +/- 5%, saline; 45 +/- 3%, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@; p = ns), as was the LV end-diastolic pressure (8 +/- 1 mm Hg, saline; 7 +/- 1 mm Hg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@; p = ns).

citations.NLM: Kloner RA, Hale SL, Alker KJ. Absence of hemodynamic deterioration in the presence of amlodipine following experimental myocardial infarction. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1992;20(5):837-45. PMID: 1280749
citations.BibTeX: @article{1280749, title={Absence of hemodynamic deterioration in the presence of amlodipine following experimental myocardial infarction.}, author={Kloner RA and Hale SL and Alker KJ}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={20}, number={5}, pages={837-45}}

results.title: Reduction in infarct size by chronic amlodipine treatment in cholesterol-fed rabbits.
results.text_hl: We therefore examined the effects of chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treatment (5 mg/kg daily for 10 weeks, p.o.) on @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size after 30-min @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@/48-h reperfusion in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ fed a diet with or without 1% @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@.

citations.NLM: Hoshida S, Yamashita N, Kuzuya T, Hori M. Reduction in infarct size by chronic amlodipine treatment in cholesterol-fed rabbits. Atherosclerosis. 1998 May;138(1):163-70. PMID: 9678782

results.title: Biphasic survival response to amlodipine after myocardial infarction in rats: Association with cardiac vascular remodeling.
results.text_hl: One week after permanent @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@, @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomized to no treatment or daily @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (5 mg/kg) continued for up to 9 months.

citations.NLM: Whittaker P, Zhang HP, Kloner RA. Biphasic survival response to amlodipine after myocardial infarction in rats: Association with cardiac vascular remodeling. Cardiovasc Pathol. 2000 Mar-Apr;9(2):85-93. PMID: 10867358

results.title: Effects of amlodipine on myocardial infarction, infarct expansion, and ventricular geometry in the rat.
results.text_hl: Permanent @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@left coronary occlusion@@@ was created after pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, 0.25 mg/kg (low dose) or 1.0 mg/kg (high dose), or placebo, intravenously twice a day, and continued for 7 days after @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Hagar JM, Newman LG, Kloner RA. Effects of amlodipine on myocardial infarction, infarct expansion, and ventricular geometry in the rat. Am Heart J. 1992 Sep;124(3):571-80. PMID: 1387506

results.title: Prinzmetal angina: An unrecognized cause of recurrent ST elevation myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: Given concern for reocclusion, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ again underwent urgent cardiac catheterization showing subtotal @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@occlusion of the proximal RCA@@@.
